website_summaries.verdict: If you want the outstanding cold retention qualities of the Tundra 65 but don't want the weight, this represents a great compromise.
pros: Outstanding cold retention in a cooler that can be managed by one person
It can hold up to 20 cans of soda
cons: The Hopper 20 is even more portable, holds almost as much, and costs quite a bit less

customer_reviews.title: Good small volume cooler for camping
customer_reviews.text: Still experimenting with getting the right balance of ice and packs to ensure several days of cold. Works for a good 24-36 hours with no problem, but more than 36 and it all melts. This is a good volume for 2-3 days of camp meals, snacks, and drinks for two people - hoping to get to the point where we can eat out of it for three days without replacing the ice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: It leaks around the drain plug
customer_reviews.text: It does keep things cold but it leaks around drain plug. I’ve made sure it was screwed in correctly but still leaks
customer_reviews.author: LeMyra Mace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler, strict return policy
customer_reviews.text: The best cooler in the game hands down. My only issue is how small it is ... you can't really get a perspective for how much (or little) space it has until it arrives.. and by that time it's too late to return. Their return policy kind of sucks in that regard, so REALLY be sure this is the size you want before spending a jagillion dollars on a cooler that can only hold a dozen drinks / 1 or 2 Tupperware containers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Large, bulky and heavy with small storage space. Does not hold ice for over a day in 80 degrees in the shade. My $24.99 igloo works much better and is lighter, easier to transport, holds ice longer and more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: heather hudson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I needed to do an upgrade from my Roadie 20 and get the Tundra 35, I was gonna get the 45 but it would be too heavy to lift the 45 up onto my rooftop rack so I gor the 35 and its much lighter to lift up onto the roof rack. It has the same qualities as my Roadie 20 but just larger, the rope carrying handles are ok but not my personal favorite, the main thing is the cooler keeps the ice longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Babila

customer_reviews.title: Love my Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Love my Yeti. Placed it in between seats in Class C motorhome and it doubles as a great place for our little dog to ride and see out the window. Have also used it on road teips in the SUV . It is durable and keeps everything super cold.
customer_reviews.author: Gnu

customer_reviews.title: Keep your stuff cold longer
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. I have its big brother the 65. We got it for a trip to Yellowstone and it kept the ice chips frozen for a week. This one is small enough that it fit between our RV seats so I could reach in and get a cold drink. It is worth the money, trust me. I am tossing all my other coolers now that I have Yetis.
customer_reviews.author: Tadashi

customer_reviews.title: Most over-hyped, over-priced item I've purchased in ages.
customer_reviews.text: I put 10 lb. in on Friday, Saturday there was a lot of ice in the water so I put 10 lb. ice in. Tuesday it was water, but cool. Wednesday it was above safe food handling temps. I could have bought a Cooler at Walmart under a hundred bucks that would perform the same, I know, I had one but wanted better. "Get a Yeti" they said. I only gave it two stars because, with two padlocks, it is a bear proof container. Way overpriced as a cooler, but not bad for bear proof storage.
customer_reviews.author: WestGARider

customer_reviews.title: Sweating coolers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these coolers to transport Dry ice in because the ratings say they are dry ice compatible. However, they sweat so bad with the dry ice in them that keeping them in a vehicle is a "wet" option. For only that reason, I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Tank of a Cooler; but too heavy for some uses.
customer_reviews.text: The thermal insulation capability of this cooler is like nothing I have ever had before. It is built like a tank too. The tag that came attached to it says that it is "bear resistant". I can believe it. The only negative is that it is heavy. The weight, especially when loaded, makes it not my first choice for a cooler that needs to be carried any distance or lifted into and moved around in my boat. But, when I need to maintain ice or cool items for a long time, like on long road trips or outdoors where it doesn't need to be moved too much, this cooler is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband who does construction work in the sweltering Texas sun. It keeps ice for days. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: It leaks! I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and it’s plug doesn’t seal! I’m not impressed. These are very expensive and it should not leak! I have a Yeti and it’s plug doesn’t leak. It seems like this one has a harder rubber than mine and it doesn’t want to seal.
customer_reviews.author: Sledhound

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is expensive, but you get what you pay for. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Deignan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to give my father for father’s Day. Perfect size for a couple people to go out on the boat with or for a drive. Can def fit a decent amount of drinks and some small items to eat!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It will keep stuff cold for days
customer_reviews.text: The walls are thick and it is extremely well made. It will keep things cold for days. I put wet ice (32 degree ice) and 4 days later there was almost no water. Still ice. Downside: 23 pounds empty.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cooler I've ever owned will buy another one just wish it was cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product but replacement was fine.
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used this cooler it leaked. We sent it back and the replacement worked fine
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Yeti cant go wrong !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands bday! He loves it , we use it on our fishing and campling trips it keeps everything cold longer! only thing he doesn't like is the rope handles.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Wanless

customer_reviews.title: Does keep things colder much longer than a regular cooler.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. It is heavier than anticipated when empty.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I would not order this again because it is too heavy to manage on my own. Ice may last longer but I am not convinced.
customer_reviews.author: particular shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cooler was a gift for my son. He is very happy with it. He uses it for tailgating and it keeps things nice and cold
customer_reviews.author: picky consumer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. Expensive, but well worth it. Keeps ice for days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive, but worth. It can keep everything cool for a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: They loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I thought it was a bit small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mlalcaro

customer_reviews.title: Love my Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Just like I hoped it would be. Can't say if it keeps ice real well because it still has ice 1 day later. Hardly melted at all.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K Reighter

customer_reviews.title: Just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present for father in law. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie P.

customer_reviews.title: Yeti is the answer
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice and contents cold, on sale price was better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a Yeti live up to all the hype?
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does. Its high quality construction ensures things stay cooler longer. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love YETI
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly for the size and great quality. LOVE YETI products!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: the best cooler ever!
customer_reviews.text: yeti is the best! keeps all of my drinks so cold!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hill

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellent for my trip from Rochester NY to Bowling Green Ky. Kept food nice and cold very little ice melted.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Szydlowski

customer_reviews.title: Yeti cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a Yeti cooler for a long time. It keeps beer cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: angela alexander

customer_reviews.title: Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Packed it with frozen food. Drove to FL. Still frozen . We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo J

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: He wanted it for travel. His choice and its great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Boren

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It’s a perfect size for the boat. Keeps things cold for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Louise M.

customer_reviews.title: To me this cooler meets all of needs I care about and it was well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: So far this cooler keeps can drinks much colder and ice lasts way longer then any of many coolers I have owned
customer_reviews.author: Paul  S Hume

customer_reviews.title: Looks bigger from the outside.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, walls are very thick and the cooler is quite heavy but works well and is built heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Good to take on a boat. It keeps things cold for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: janice hornbostel

customer_reviews.title: Best gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and size. Super light and makes ice last FOREVER!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler P.

customer_reviews.title: Rapid Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality product and rapid fast delivery from amazon. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Devin Sherron

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room. Keeps drinks cold for days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlana Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Raffle/Auction Item
customer_reviews.text: Donated this as a gift for charity auctions and was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Guarino

customer_reviews.title: Scratched on the top of the cooler.
customer_reviews.text: There are two visible scratches on the top of the cooler, box was not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac zamora

customer_reviews.title: Yeti cooler wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Desert Tan one but got a White one.
customer_reviews.author: Doris C. Danforth

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding piece
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Outstanding quality! Thick walls, heavy-duty carry handles, rubber latches, and a wire removable basket all contribute to a unique piece not found in regular plastic containers. I can see why it's necessary to buy a lock for them. Their only drawback is they are heavy, but that's why they work as well as they do.
customer_reviews.author: Klynkon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cooler. Our fridge power went out and we stored our frozen food in it with no ice and lasted two days still frozen. Probably would've lasted longer!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: A really nice cooler. Keeps ice longer than any cooler I've ...
customer_reviews.text: A really nice cooler.Keeps ice longer than any cooler I've owned. Its a bit heavy when loaded but that's the trade off I suppose.Well insulated.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: It comes in a box marked yeti in giant letters!
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit. My husband loved it. However, if this is a gift and you think you're being sneaky and that it will come in an Amazon box.... you'll be wrong. It said Yeti in gigantic letters all over the box. If this had been left in my porch- you could have read it from the road- and it would probably have been stolen. Great product-- poor packaging!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rives

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler! I'm still experimenting with it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler! I'm still experimenting with it. Block ice lasts days. Lid seals good enough to keep ants out! Worth at least 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Hype!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe it until I saw it. Recovering from shoulder and ankle surgeries and needed a lot of ice readily available. Have an ice maker. Ice in this cooler lasts for DAYS! Granted, the cooler is sitting in my house but a coleman cooler of approximately the same capacity had NO ice after HOURS under same conditions. I am a camper so this will be a great asset while traveling. Pros: Badass cooler, heavy duty construction, many accessories available Cons: EXPENSIVE, target for thieves (will steal the COOLER not the stuff inside!) I recommend this to anyone who is serious about extending the life of their ice!
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Best Cooler ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooler I have ever owned! Its a quite expensive but well worth the price. I have used it for beach days and camping multiple times and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wheeling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wheeler riding and not overly heavy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Monski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It keeps everything cold longer than any other cooler out there, well worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Sean Theunick

customer_reviews.title: Yeti is a quality product and I saved because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Yeti is a quality product and I saved because I purchased a new product in a box was slightly damaged. The product was unscathed!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Must have a great reputation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to give away in a raffle. It was so popular it brought in more than 10 times what it was bought for. Must have a great reputation!
customer_reviews.author: carlos mira

customer_reviews.title: Glad I broke down and bought it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, yes. Works well, absolutely. I’m sure this cooler will last me a long long time. Glad I broke down and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler was the perfect size to keep foods cool on our beach camping trip. It hardly ever needed additional ice....great insulation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: WOW - The Rolls Royce of coolers. You get what you pay for. And more.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Hammerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a nice cooler, it was used as a prize for a Poker ride.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B.

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my son and he loved everything about it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and he loved everything about it. I thought it was terribly expensive but now I believe you can buy happiness. It was totally worth it to see him so happy!
customer_reviews.author: barbara gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Will easily hold a 12 pack and lots of ice. Stays cold for days. It's expensive, but if you use coolers a lot, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, great price, perfect Fathers Day gift! 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for my husband! Not too big but definitely not small! Great product for price!! 5 stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: All Yeti products are great. Insulates well. This particular Yeti is VERY heavy without anything in it. If you are traveling solo not a good choice. If you have someone to help you lift and carry it should meet your needs. SMALLER inside than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great but they are $300...........my son likes his gift for his pontoon boat!
customer_reviews.author: mark patterson

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced...even on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but the competition out on the market today makes these way overpriced and over engineered. Have one now, will not likely pay so much for another.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t had the opportunity to use your product but ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the opportunity to use your product but it certainly looks very well made its going to be heavy when full though.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Richards

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this and it works well.and it isn't too large that it takes up the back of my car when I put my frozen products from the store. Perfect size. Kathleen
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kellerman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than a standard cooler. I haven't found it capable of keeping ice for the duration advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for campers...
customer_reviews.text: a Christmas gift for my son who can't say enough good things about this Yeti cooler. He and his wife enjoy camping and this size is just right for their trips.
customer_reviews.author: Pill Princess

customer_reviews.title: Took it out of the box did what it said to cool it then went camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler to use when camping. Took it out of the box did what it said to cool it then went camping. I even had it in a camper not in the sun and it wouldn't keep ice 24 hrs!!!!!! Let alone a week..... DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!wish I could get my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: c cowgill

customer_reviews.title: Performed no better than my old 30 dollar Coleman
customer_reviews.text: Not convinced (yet) it's worth the price. The gasket leaked and at a max, it barely held ice in 70 degree weather 3 days. I followed the "pre-cool" method before a campout...Performed no better than my old 30 dollar Coleman. I contacted customer service, and they were very helpful. They immediately sent me a new gasket so I'll put this thing to the test again. I'm hoping that it will perform as claimed with a new gasket. If it does, in all fairness I'll come back and get this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a Yeti other than it's the most awesome gift you can give anyone that has use for a cooler; you'll be the hero gift giver!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lande

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler - keeps thing frozen!
customer_reviews.text: I love my yeti. I keep it in the car and it will hold popsicles frozen on a very hot day (with a bag of ice) for an hour (I'm sure longer than that) They were as frozen as when I bought them. It is like a freezer as long as you have ice in it to keep the other stuff frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Always Happy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Yeti cooler for my husband and he loves it! The ice lasts about a week in fairly warm temps. Ice would melt in a day in his old cooler. I would definately recommend this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Some disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Doesn't do the job as long as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John Myler

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as an anniversary gift and he was ecstatic! This is the BEST cooler you can possibly buy! The ice stays for days compared to the older coolers that required daily ice put in them! It's an investment you won't regret! My husband couldn't have asked for a better gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeti Cooler 35Qt tan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. It does everything that you need a cooler to do. It is very durable and can last forever, it keeps ice for a week, every part is replaceable, it floats, has available tie down areas, durable t-latches to keep it air tight, and it is even bear proof. I use this cooler for hunting, fishing, BBQ's, and parties. There are a number of accessories available through the yeticoolers website to enhance your cooler. I highly suggest the yeti to anyone looking for a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: scpatriot

customer_reviews.title: ... you could pull it is very expensive do not recommend for no
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is very overrated far as price heavy one person can carry it after it's filled with ice also to buy the other assessor raise so you could pull it is very expensive do not recommend for no one
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Yes the cooler was great only complaint was being over charged for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Elkins

customer_reviews.title: There's still ice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first YETI product purchase and I am quite impressed! I commute over quite a distance and keep my 35 in my trunk and was surprised to find Ice a week later. Bravo YETI, bravo.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Parker

product_meta.title: YETI Tundra 35 Cooler
feature_bullets: The YETI Tundra 35 is portable enough for one person to haul while still having an impressive carrying capacity of up to 20 cans with a recommended 2:1 ice-to-contents ratio
Ice stays ice thanks to up to 3 inches of PermaFrost Insulation and an extra thick FatWall design is certified Bear-Resistant

The Rotomolded Construction makes the Tundra armored to the core and virtually indestructible so wherever you decide to take it, this portable cooler’s sturdy construction will stand up to the rigors of the journey
All Tundra coolers feature T-Rex Lid Latches constructed of heavy-duty rubber so you’ll never see another busted latch and has patented keeper technology
The Tundra 35 dimensions are 21 3/8 in long x 16 1/8 in wide x 15 3/4 in high with an empty weight of 20 lbs NOTE: All Tundra models come standard with one dry goods basket
